name: Dead Weight (NewGameStudio, Fearawl, vfd11, Rogotch)
description:
Created for Godot Wild Jam #54

Lex is a pirate who makes crazy single boarding of ships. After hearing an ancient legend about an Ancient God, he began to seek his Blessing.

  • 12 levels
  • 10 skills
  • Cool Story!

Control and features:

LMB — control
Space — wait
Esc — menu
